title: Bills
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Pay Bills**

- [How do I pay my bills using GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004373166-How-do-I-pay-my-bills-using-GCash)
- [How can I add/save my favorite billers in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283013296793-How-can-I-add-save-my-favorite-billers-in-GCash)
- [How do I schedule my bills payment in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020931693-How-do-I-schedule-my-bills-payment-in-GCash)

**Get Help with Bills**

- [I can’t pay bills using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283132306329-I-can-t-pay-bills-using-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [I did not receive my top-up after using Bills. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43474227595417-I-did-not-receive-my-top-up-after-using-Bills-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash bill payment was not posted or confirmed by the biller. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283229084185-My-GCash-bill-payment-was-not-posted-or-confirmed-by-the-biller-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times for my bills payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283455559449-I-was-charged-multiple-times-for-my-bills-payment-What-do-I-do)
- [I entered the wrong details when paying my bills with GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283468296089-I-entered-the-wrong-details-when-paying-my-bills-with-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash bills payment failed. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43589087034265-My-GCash-bills-payment-failed-What-do-I-do)
[See all 8 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/30283136376217-Get-Help-with-Bills)
